data.title: Child's Song
data.statement:
You may have heard of the children song "Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes" which is sung repeatedly and each round <<one more keyword>> is left out until all keywords are silent.

Lets sing together!

HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, _, KNEES and TOES
_, _, _ and TOES
_, _, _ and _

There are also different versions of this where only <<one letter>> is removed from a keyword. In this German song the removing is <<starting at the back>> of the keyword:

auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WANZE
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WANZ_
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WAN__
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WA___
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine W____
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine ______

The verses are in lower case with the keywords in upper case. The replacement each round is the underscore ({{_}}) as seen in the examples above.

testCases.title: The Classic
testCases.testIn:
WORDS FRONT
4
HEAD SHOULDERS KNEES TOES
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
testCases.testOut:
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, _, KNEES and TOES
_, _, _ and TOES
_, _, _ and _

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
WORDS FRONT
5
AHEAD BSHOULDERS CKNEES DTOES EVALID
AHEAD, BSHOULDERS, CKNEES and DTOES, are EVALID
testCases.testOut:
AHEAD, BSHOULDERS, CKNEES and DTOES, are EVALID
_, BSHOULDERS, CKNEES and DTOES, are EVALID
_, _, CKNEES and DTOES, are EVALID
_, _, _ and DTOES, are EVALID
_, _, _ and _, are EVALID
_, _, _ and _, are _

testCases.title: The German
testCases.testIn:
LETTERS BACK
1
WANZE
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WANZE
testCases.testOut:
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WANZE
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WANZ_
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WAN__
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WA___
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine W____
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine _____

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
LETTERS BACK
1
BUG
on the wall, on the lookout, is  a little BUG
testCases.testOut:
on the wall, on the lookout, is  a little BUG
on the wall, on the lookout, is  a little BU_
on the wall, on the lookout, is  a little B__
on the wall, on the lookout, is  a little ___

testCases.title: The Comedian
testCases.testIn:
LETTERS FRONT
7
K E T T E R ING
K ana E ana T ana T, E and R ana ING
testCases.testOut:
K ana E ana T ana T, E and R ana ING
_ ana E ana T ana T, E and R ana ING
_ ana _ ana T ana T, E and R ana ING
_ ana _ ana _ ana T, E and R ana ING
_ ana _ ana _ ana _, E and R ana ING
_ ana _ ana _ ana _, _ and R ana ING
_ ana _ ana _ ana _, _ and _ ana ING
_ ana _ ana _ ana _, _ and _ ana _NG
_ ana _ ana _ ana _, _ and _ ana __G
_ ana _ ana _ ana _, _ and _ ana ___

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
LETTERS FRONT
7
KAY E TEE TEE E AR ING
KAY ana E ana TEE ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
testCases.testOut:
KAY ana E ana TEE ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
_AY ana E ana TEE ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
__Y ana E ana TEE ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
___ ana E ana TEE ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana TEE ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana _EE ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana __E ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana TEE, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana _EE, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana __E, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana ___, E and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana ___, _ and AR ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana ___, _ and _R ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana ___, _ and __ ana ING
___ ana _ ana ___ ana ___, _ and __ ana _NG
___ ana _ ana ___ ana ___, _ and __ ana __G
___ ana _ ana ___ ana ___, _ and __ ana ___

testCases.title: The backwards Classic
testCases.testIn:
WORDS BACK
4
HEAD SHOULDERS KNEES TOES
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
testCases.testOut:
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and _
HEAD, SHOULDERS, _ and _
HEAD, _, _ and _
_, _, _ and _

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
WORDS BACK
4
HEADS ARMPITS ELBOWS NOSE
HEADS, ARMPITS, ELBOWS and NOSE
testCases.testOut:
HEADS, ARMPITS, ELBOWS and NOSE
HEADS, ARMPITS, ELBOWS and _
HEADS, ARMPITS, _ and _
HEADS, _, _ and _
_, _, _ and _

testCases.title: The duplicate backwards Classic
testCases.testIn:
WORDS BACK
5
HEAD SHOULDERS KNEES TOES KNEES
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES, and KNEES again
testCases.testOut:
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES, and KNEES again
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES, and _ again
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and _, and _ again
HEAD, SHOULDERS, _ and _, and _ again
HEAD, _, _ and _, and _ again
_, _, _ and _, and _ again

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn:
WORDS BACK
5
BODY TABLE YOU TABLE BODY
BODY, TABLE, YOU and TABLE, and BODY again
testCases.testOut:
BODY, TABLE, YOU and TABLE, and BODY again
BODY, TABLE, YOU and TABLE, and _ again
BODY, TABLE, YOU and _, and _ again
BODY, TABLE, _ and _, and _ again
BODY, _, _ and _, and _ again
_, _, _ and _, and _ again

data.constraints:
1 <= [[k]] <= 10
[[keywords]] are in upper case and listed in order of appearance.
[[verse]] is lower case with upper case keywords.
data.stubGenerator:
read substitutionMode:word(10) startPoint:word(10)
read k:int
loopline k keyword:string(100)
read verse:string(100)

write a beautiful song
data.inputDescription:
<<First line:>> A space separated string containing {{WORDS}} or {{LETTERS}} indicating if we remove whole words or letters, and {{FRONT}} or {{BACK}} indicating if we start from the front or the back of the keywords.
<<Second line:>> The number of keywords [[k]].
<<Third line:>> A string of [[k]] [[keywords]] separated by space.
<<Fourth line:>> The original [[verse]] including the keywords.
data.outputDescription: Some number of lines starting with the original [[verse]]. Each line has the next keyword or next letter of a keyword replaced with a underscore ({{_}}). The last line is the "empty" [[verse]] with underscores ({{_}}) instead of keywords

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You may have heard of the children song "Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes" which is sung repeatedly and each round one more keyword is left out until all keywords are silent.

Lets sing together!

HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, _, KNEES and TOES
_, _, _ and TOES
_, _, _ and _

There are also different versions of this where only one letter is removed from a keyword. In this German song the removing is starting at the back of the keyword:

auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WANZE
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WANZ_
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WAN__
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine WA___
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine W____
auf der mauer, auf der lauer, sitzt ne kleine ______

The verses are in lower case with the keywords in upper case. The replacement each round is the underscore (_) as seen in the examples above.
Input
First line: A space separated string containing WORDS or LETTERS indicating if we remove whole words or letters, and FRONT or BACK indicating if we start from the front or the back of the keywords.
Second line: The number of keywords k.
Third line: A string of k keywords separated by space.
Fourth line: The original verse including the keywords.
Output
Some number of lines starting with the original verse. Each line has the next keyword or next letter of a keyword replaced with a underscore (_). The last line is the "empty" verse with underscores (_) instead of keywords
Constraints
1 <= k <= 10
keywords are in upper case and listed in order of appearance.
verse is lower case with upper case keywords.
Example
Input
WORDS FRONT
4
HEAD SHOULDERS KNEES TOES
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
Output
HEAD, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, SHOULDERS, KNEES and TOES
_, _, KNEES and TOES
_, _, _ and TOES
_, _, _ and _
